3386.verse: ۞ وَلَا|And (do) not|105|117|25$تُجَـٰدِلُوٓاْ|argue|91|114|13653$أَهْلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ|(with the) People of the Book|216|239|13654$إِلَّا|except|65|88|86$بِٱلَّتِى|by which|79|102|10198$هِىَ|[it]|53|65|665$أَحْسَنُ|(is) best,|81|90|1249$إِلَّا|except|65|83|86$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|107|20$ظَلَمُواْ|(do) wrong|93|111|558$مِنْهُمْ‌ۖ|among them,|106|124|730$وَقُولُوٓاْ|and say,|85|103|551$ءَامَنَّا|`We believe|100|109|78$بِٱلَّذِىٓ|in that (which)|119|129|597$أُنزِلَ|has been revealed|141|161|44$إِلَيْنَا|to us|57|77|1234$وَأُنزِلَ|and was revealed|136|156|13655$إِلَيْكُمْ|to you.|69|89|2453$وَإِلَـٰهُنَا|And our God|101|111|13656$وَإِلَـٰهُكُمْ|and your God|108|139|1412$وَٲحِدٌ|(is) One,|78|140|4675$وَنَحْنُ|and we|76|138|319$لَهُۥ|to Him|62|124|977$مُسْلِمُونَ|submit.`|101|132|1210$

3387.verse: وَكَذَٲلِكَ|And thus|91|104|1273$أَنزَلْنَآ|We (have) revealed|151|176|929$إِلَيْكَ|to you|63|88|45$ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ‌ۚ|the Book.|88|113|451$فَٱلَّذِينَ|So those|79|104|3632$ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمُ|We gave [them]|128|140|1120$ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ|the Book|88|96|451$يُؤْمِنُونَ|believe|94|111|35$بِهِۦ‌ۖ|therein.|71|88|204$وَمِنْ|And among|93|110|1133$هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ|these|82|99|335$مَن|(are some) who|124|141|76$يُؤْمِنُ|believe|72|80|2051$بِهِۦ‌ۚ|therein.|71|87|204$وَمَا|And none|82|115|46$يَجْحَدُ|reject|73|106|13657$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِنَآ|Our Verses|92|125|408$إِلَّا|except|65|98|86$ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ|the disbelievers.|128|144|4590$

3388.verse: وَمَا|And not|72|90|46$كُنتَ|(did) you|80|115|1281$تَتْلُواْ|recite|64|99|946$مِن قَبْلِهِۦ|before it,|107|142|3324$مِن|any|50|85|53$كِتَـٰبٍ|Book,|71|106|3052$وَلَا|and not|71|88|25$تَخُطُّهُۥ|(did) you write it|132|153|13658$بِيَمِينِكَ‌ۖ|with your right hand,|159|200|11371$إِذًا|in that case|100|141|1317$لَّٱرْتَابَ|surely (would) have doubted|210|231|13659$ٱلْمُبْطِلُونَ|the falsifiers.|112|112|6994$

3391.verse: أَوَلَمْ|And is (it) not|113|129|2346$يَكْفِهِمْ|sufficient for them|142|174|13660$أَنَّآ|that We|74|106|4147$أَنزَلْنَا|revealed|76|108|929$عَلَيْكَ|to you|71|103|2245$ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ|the Book|88|104|451$يُتْلَىٰ|(which) is recited|136|142|4497$عَلَيْهِمْ‌ۚ|to them?|79|92|22$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|83|58$فِى|in|48|61|89$ذَٲلِكَ|that,|64|77|28$لَرَحْمَةً|surely is a mercy|132|145|13661$وَذِكْرَىٰ|and a reminder|118|124|6244$لِقَوْمٍ|for a people|99|336|1100$يُؤْمِنُونَ|who believe.|103|340|35$

3392.verse: قُلْ|Say,|50|57|765$كَفَىٰ|`Sufficient is|106|119|9510$بِٱللَّهِ|Allah|61|74|79$بَيْنِى|between me|101|114|5473$وَبَيْنَكُمْ|and between you|135|148|2965$شَهِيدًا‌ۖ|(as) Witness.|109|122|1279$يَعْلَمُ|He knows|83|90|742$مَا|what|53|71|262$فِى|(is) in|58|94|89$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|151|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۗ|and the earth.|116|152|352$وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|155|42$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|100|84$بِٱلْبَـٰطِلِ|in [the] falsehood|138|146|437$وَكَفَرُواْ|and disbelieve|113|130|7753$بِٱللَّهِ|in Allah,|72|89|79$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|those,|82|99|51$هُمُ|they|50|67|56$ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ|(are) the losers.`|136|144|287$

3386.verse: And do not argue with the People of the Scripture except in a way that is best, except for those who commit injustice among them, and say, "We believe in that which has been revealed to us and revealed to you. And our God and your God is one; and we are Muslims [in submission] to Him."

3387.verse: And thus We have sent down to you the Qur'an. And those to whom We [previously] gave the Scripture believe in it. And among these [people of Makkah] are those who believe in it. And none reject Our verses except the disbelievers.

3388.verse: And you did not recite before it any scripture, nor did you inscribe one with your right hand. Otherwise the falsifiers would have had [cause for] doubt.

3389.verse: Rather, the Qur'an is distinct verses [preserved] within the breasts of those who have been given knowledge. And none reject Our verses except the wrongdoers.

3390.verse: But they say, "Why are not signs sent down to him from his Lord?" Say, "The signs are only with Allah, and I am only a clear warner."

3391.verse: And is it not sufficient for them that We revealed to you the Book which is recited to them? Indeed in that is a mercy and reminder for a people who believe.

3392.verse: Say, "Sufficient is Allah between me and you as Witness. He knows what is in the heavens and earth. And they who have believed in falsehood and disbelieved in Allah - it is those who are the losers."
